Name: Last Palabra
Ingredients: 20 ml Green Chartreuse (or alternative herbal liqueur)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of lime zest and skewered Luxardo Maraschino Cherry .
Express lime zest twist over cocktail and discard.
Review: Tequila replaces gin in this riff on the classic Last Word , with the amount of maraschino slightly reduced to accommodate the introduction of lavender syrup, which in turn is also balanced by a dash of lavender bitters.
History: Created in February 2017 by yours truly at the Cabinet Room, London, England. Last Word history
Nutrition: One serving of Last Palabra contains 180 calories
